attributes.action: Adam Crozier CEO Royal Mail must resign for accepting £3m in pay whilst Royal Mail have actually made a loss overall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adam Crozier CEO of Royal Mail in the last year accepted £3m in pay and bonuses.Whilst Royal Mail has made a financial loss in the last financial year 2007-08.He's being rewared out of public money for making Royal Mail a financial failure.This is a complete abuse of taxpayer's money and he should repay all £3m pounds and resign.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
